alert.note: Alert for Smith; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 5:41PM CDT until April 02 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Smith County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Wood County in northeastern Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 540 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Van, or 14 miles southwest of Mineola, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lindale, Hawkins, Hoard, Winona, Red Springs and Carroll. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
